Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptide selection from Lippia spp leaf transcriptomes
Literature.Author: Tavares LS, de Souza VC, Schmitz Nunes V, Nascimento Silva O, de Souza GT, Farinazzo Marques L, Capriles Goliatt PVZ, Facio Viccini L, Franco OL,  de Oliveira Santos M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 11229(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13866(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=16µg/ml)
